verses.roman:
prāte vṛndāvane kailā 'cīra-ghāṭe' snāna
teṅtulī-talāte āsi' karilā viśrāma

synonyms: prāte—in the morning; vṛndāvane—in Vṛndāvana; kailā—performed; cīra-ghāṭe snāna—bathing at Cīra-ghāṭa; teṅtulī-talāte—underneath the Teṅtulī tree; āsi'-coming; karilā viśrāma—took rest.
translation: The next morning Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returned to Vṛndāvana and took His bath at Cīra-ghāṭa. He then went to Teṅtulī-talā, where He took rest.
